SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_00.text:
What the heck? These are the visions
I see at the end of Emerald Waves,
but there's so dang many of 'em!

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_01.speaker: Man_Overworld
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_01.text:
I cannot believe I had to guide you to
this place. Why have you not awakened?
Is something in Miyako City sealing away
your power, perhaps?

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_02.text: Well, look who decided to show. Also, I'll ask the questions here, guy. Why'd you destroy the barrier around Miyako City? What are you trying to do? Who the heck even are you?

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_03.speaker: Man_Overworld
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_03.text:
Rather than hurling questions at each other,
perhaps we should watch this—for it holds
the answers you seek.

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_04.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_04.text:
Oh hey, it's Dad and Mother!
They're both so darn young...

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_05.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_05.text:
Wonder why they're visiting
the shrine.

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_06.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_06.text:
Nope! No way, fella. Never happened.
Nice try, but you can't trick this guy
with a bunch of fake fakery like that.

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_07.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido（Young_Tsunanori）
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_07.text:
Dad, we need to get to the hospital!
I gotta see my new little sister!

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_08.speaker: Masatsuna_Mido
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_08.text:
Now you just hold on there, kiddo. We'll get
a call when the baby's on the way, so there's
no need for all this hollering. Also sounds like
somebody wants a little sister, eh?

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_09.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido（Young_Tsunanori）
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_09.text: No, Daddy! She is my sister! She's already been born!

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_10.speaker: Masatsuna_Mido
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_10.text:
...Yes, this is the Mido residence.
...Hmm? The baby's been born!?
...And it's a girl?

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_11.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_11.text:
Now THIS I remember! It was the day
Tomoko was born—and the first time
I ever saw an Emerald Wave.

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_12.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_12.text: Guys, don't go to Shinko, yeah?

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_13.speaker: Friend_Tsunanori_A
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_13.text:
What's wrong there, bud?
Too afraid to hang with us, maybe?

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_14.speaker: Friend_Tsunanori_B
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_14.text:
Haw haw! It's 'cause Tsunanori's mom
is one terrifying lady, boy howdy!

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_15.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_15.text:
Look, just don't go to Shinko today.
C'mon, Asahi! Please!

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_16.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_16.text:
Well, golly. I dunno what this is about,
but if it's such a big deal to you,
I guess I'll just stay the heck home.

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_17.speaker: Shinko_People
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_17.text:
An earthquake!? No! Help me!
The entire building's going to—

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_18.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_18.text:
What in the cripes, Tsunanori!?
Did you actually KNOW there would
be an earthquake in Shinko!?

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_19.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_19.text:
It happened again... I knew something real bad was coming,
but I couldn't do a darn thing about it. I mean, shoot!
What's the point of having a power like this if everyone's
just gonna treat me like a nut!?

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_20.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_20.text:
Heck, Tsunanori. You saved my life.
I owe you...well, everything.

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_21.speaker: Man_Overworld
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_21.text:
Ah, I see! You are using your powers
incorrectly. This must be the reason
your awakening has yet to occur.

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_22.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_22.text:
Who're you to make that judgment? But sure, after the Shinko quake,
I kept quiet about the stuff I saw and just tried to solve it all myself.
I felt helpless heck back then, so that was my way of dealing with
those feelings—what's so 'incorrect' about that?

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_23.speaker: Man_Overworld
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_23.text:
What is incorrect must be corrected.
If you will not awaken of your own
volition, then I will do it for you.

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_24.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_24.text:
Hey! No fighting here!
Take it outside, you two.

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_25.speaker: Man_Overworld
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_010_25.text:
No. It must be done here; I need the
power of Providence to awaken this fool.

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_100_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_100_01.text:
It isn't so simple as that. His kind exists on
all the worlds, and they are ever striving to
make them all as one. No, I fear all you have
done is open the door to an eternity of conflict.

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_100_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_100_02.text:
And are you one of these fellas
lookin' to make all the worlds one?

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_100_03.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_100_03.text:
I am merely an observer—for if no one
were watching, there would be no point
in these visions existing at all.
Thus, I continue to observe.

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_100_04.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_100_04.text:
Can't say I really get all that, but suppose
I'll chalk it up to another example of all
the diverse worlds out there.

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_100_05.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_100_05.text:
If you perceive a unique interpretation as
a form of diversity, it may well be true.
Regardless, you have no further business
in this place, and I would ask you to leave.

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_110_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_110_01.text:
The idea to 'protect Miyako City' was cast
upon me like a curse, but now I finally
understand what I should truly protect.

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_110_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_110_02.text:
I will return to Miyako City
and do what I must.

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_110_03.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_110_03.text:
Giving us yet another horribly
tedious world...

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_110_05.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_CUT_110_05.text:
Me? Oh, never. I am the Observer,
after all. All I do is observe.

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
What the heck? These are the visions
I see at the end of Emerald Waves,
but there's so dang many of 'em!

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Watching just one or two is enough to make a
fella loopy—can't even imagine what'd happen
if I watched this many at once. Who the heck
is even seeing all this stuff?

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_SCAN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_SCAN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Wonder if somebody watches all these
visions from that chair, maybe?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_000.text:
Why, if it isn't Tsunanori Mido.
What brings you to Providence?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_010.text:
Who are you? How do you know my name?
Also, are you the person who created
all these visions?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_020.text:
My, but you do enjoy asking questions!
Or perhaps you merely take some
special interest in me?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_030.text:
The only thing that interests me
is spirits and their power, bud. So where are the spirits in this world
of visions? Or heck, maybe I should just
ask which of these visions HAS spirits?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_040.text: Perceptive as ever, I see. But of course, discovering visions is your special power, Tsunanori Mido.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_050.text:
Then I guess you won't mind
if I poke around a bit?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_060.text:
Poke away, Tsunanori Mido—because I cannot
WAIT to see if finding the spirits you seek
will truly be so easy at that!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_000.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_000.text:
It is just as I told you, no? Finding spirits
is not so easy a matter here—or perhaps you
have simply discovered the joys of watching
all these visions instead?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_010.text:
Hey, I'm in no hurry. Just taking it nice
and easy with the visions here until
I find a spirit that's a good fit.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_020.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_020.text:
Then please, watch all you desire—
for that is surely why you were
guided to this place. Heh heh.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_030.text:
Why does everything you say sound like
it has some creepy meaning behind it?
You trying to hide your heart like you
hide your face, maybe?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_210_CUT_000_000.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_210_CUT_000_000.text:
Ah, it seems you've discovered the joys
of watching visions. Perhaps someone has
finally appeared who understands my own
feelings for them? How wonderful!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_210_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_210_CUT_000_010.text:
Look, just 'cause I got my spirit doesn't mean
I need to rush on outta here—and I'm also not
some kind of creeper who likes watching other
folks' lives, so don't even suggest it.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_210_CUT_000_020.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_210_CUT_000_020.text:
You needn't justify yourself to me,
Tsunanori Mido! After all, I admit freely
that I derive nothing but the greatest
of enjoyment from observing visions.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_210_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_210_CUT_000_030.text:
You say you enjoy it, but you seem
kinda gloomy about all this.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_000.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_000.text:
Getting flustered that we still haven't won
any spirit power, are we? Well, don't worry—
there should be an opportunity soon enough.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_010.text: Appreciate the concern, but I'm not flustered. In fact, I think seeing all these visions— no, experiencing 'em—is giving me new insight into how I can use my own.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_020.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_020.text:
I fear I do not know what you mean,
Tsunanori Mido. As someone who merely
observes, the concept of 'using'
a vision has never occurred to me.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_030.text: So you just sit around watching all this? You never actually act on anything? Sounds pretty pointless to me there.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_310_CUT_000_000.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_310_CUT_000_000.text: Are you enjoying yourself, Tsunanori Mido? We can be honest here, you and I; you can admit how nothing is more entertaining than watching visions of others! Or perhaps such things are not exciting enough for a young man like yourself? Do you find them lacking, perchance?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_310_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_310_CUT_000_010.text:
Yep, this is all starting to make sense:
you watched so many exciting visions that
your emotions ended up going all haywire. That's why you don't help folks when you
see 'em having trouble in these visions:
the part of you that's supposed to have
empathy is all shorted out.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_310_CUT_000_020.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_310_CUT_000_020.text:
The visions I see represent but an
infinitesimally small portion of events
which occur in all the Conjoined Worlds,
Tsunanori Mido. Do you truly think that reaching out a
helping hand on the occasions it strikes
my fancy will accomplish anything at all?
No, that is a ridiculous thought.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_310_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_310_CUT_000_030.text:
I'm not claiming you have to run around
saving everyone, bud; I'm saying that
when you DO feel a need to help someone,
it's fine to go ahead and act on it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_000_CUT_00.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_000_CUT_00.text: That is the question, isn't it.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_000_CUT_00.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_000_CUT_00.text:
This is where you die,
Tsunanori Mido.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_000_CUT_00.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_000_CUT_00.text:
You should have departed the moment you
acquired your spirit power, yet you chose
to continue watching visions instead. So now you can bear witness to your
last and final vision—for your fate
has already been sealed.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_000_CUT_00.text: You think it would have been smarter to leave? Hard no there, bud. Watching visions like this, I feel like things are finally starting to progress a bit—or maybe it's more that I am.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_000_CUT_00.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_000_CUT_00.text:
How absurd. Your final moments might
play out in various ways, but the end
result ever remains the same. I have watched this vision time and time
again, Tsunanori Mido; your fate was set
the moment you arrived in Providence.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_000_CUT_00.text:
Sounds like you and me use our visions
in different ways...so lemme show ya
how a Mido does it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_000_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_000_CUT_01.text:
You see that, bud?
This wasn't my end at all.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_000_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_000_CUT_01.text:
Are you truly claiming you can
overcome even your own visions?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_000_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_000_CUT_01.text:
I can change them BECAUSE they're my
own visions. All I gotta do is keep on
truckin' and not give up until I get it right.
Or at least, that's how it works for me.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_000_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_000_CUT_01.text: But at some point you will have to confront the fate of the worlds, for the overturning of a destiny always comes at great cost. So I will continue watching you, Tsunanori Mido—for I wish to see the surprise on your face when that bill finally comes due.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_000_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_000_CUT_01.text:
Can't say I love being peeped on like that,
but since I know you aren't gonna stop,
hey, you do you. See you around.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_010_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_010_CUT_01.text:
I envied you, Tsunanori Mido—and even
thought you might finally be the one
to change the way I live. And it turns out I was correct: I meddled
in a vision for the first and last time,
and used it to guide your Emerald Wave
to this very door.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_010_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_010_CUT_01.text:
I have been watching you for a long time,
and know you possess countless futures. So do not worry, Tsunanori Mido!
Instead, believe in your waves
and keep moving ever forward.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_010_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_010_CUT_01.text:
Now hold the heck on! Are you telling me
you brought me here just to put an end
to this? That's so shootin' SELFISH!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_020_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_020_CUT_01.text:
Guess this ends with me not having
to see your visions anymore, eh?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_020_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_020_CUT_01.text:
Is this how you've always gone
about things, Tsunanori Mido?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_020_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_020_CUT_01.text:
Nah, things usually don't work out this well.
If anything, I've got way more failures than
victories. But all a fella can do is have faith
he'll eventually figure something out.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_020_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_020_CUT_01.text:
But your future can change too, you know—
or is seeing everyone's futures but your own
the thing that keeps you glued to that chair?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_020_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_020_CUT_01.text:
Perhaps it is, at that. But I cannot allow myself
to follow your destiny alone, Tsunanori Mido,
for the visions I see are legion.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_020_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_020_CUT_01.text:
So are you a god or something?
'Cause ya don't really look like one.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_020_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_020_CUT_01.text:
If creating the world makes one a 'god,'
then I do not qualify. I simply watch,
as I shall continue to do until the
Conjoined Worlds meet their end.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_020_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_020_CUT_01.text:
Well, from time to time, go ahead and
peek in on me, maybe. Oh, and don't you
go forgetting my name! See ya around.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_020_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MIDO_020_CUT_01.text:
Oh, I will be watching you until
the bitter end, Tsunanori Mido.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_KA_300_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_KA_300_CUT_000_000.text:
A vision of a fire spirit?
Well, that sure was easy to find.
Looks pretty strong, though.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_KIN_300_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_KIN_300_CUT_000_000.text:
A vision of a metal spirit?
Well, that sure was easy to find.
Looks pretty strong, though.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_KA_200_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_KA_200_CUT_000_000.text:
A vision of a fire spirit.
Looks fairly strong, too.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_KIN_200_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_KIN_200_CUT_000_000.text:
A vision of a metal spirit.
Looks fairly strong, too.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_KA_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_KA_100_CUT_000_000.text:
A vision of a fire spirit.
Looks just about right for me, too.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_KIN_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_KIN_100_CUT_000_000.text:
A vision of a metal spirit.
Looks just about right for me, too.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_KA_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_KA_000_CUT_000_000.text:
A vision of a fire spirit.
Looks pretty weak, honestly.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_KIN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_KIN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
A vision of a metal spirit.
Looks pretty weak, honestly.

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_WQUEST_INITIAL_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_WQUEST_INITIAL_000_CUT.text:
Holy moly, we got visions as far as the
eye can see! Er, but doesn't seem like any
are linking to me through Emerald Waves?

SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_WQUEST_INITIAL_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_WRLD_MIDO_WQUEST_INITIAL_000_CUT.text:
Guess that means all these visions
belong to other folks, maybe?

SUB_W14_SCAN_MIDO_WQUEST_1ST_SCAN_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_SCAN_MIDO_WQUEST_1ST_SCAN_000_CU.text:
That chair sticks out like a sore thumb.
Pretty spooky stuff.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_000.text:
What the heck is this chair
even doing here, anyway?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Bwah! Who the heck are you, bud,
and how long you been sittin' there!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_030.text:
I am... Well, you may
call me the Observer.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_040.text:
The Observer, eh? I'm guessing all
these visions are yours, then? So if you just sit there and observe,
that's probably how you know my name
and knew I was on the way.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_050.text:
My visions can intrude into any world at
any time, projecting to me those whose
lives totter in the vicissitudes of fate.
I behold them without pause. Such is my fate.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Doesn't sound like much fun if you ask me—
in fact, it seems downright creepy. Heck,
if you see folks in trouble, you oughta do
whatever you can to help 'em out.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_070.text:
None can defy their fate, nor do the
destinies of strangers affect me.
What meaning could possibly be found
in attempting to save them?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Hey, I get that it may not affect you directly, 
so maybe it's meaningless in that respect—
but this whole I'm-above-it-all philosophy
really sticks in my craw. Also, folks can change fate in all sorts
of ways. Heck, I do it all the time!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_090.text:
I thought you might say that. So come, then!
Sit in this chair. Doing so will grant you the
ability to meddle in my visions and alter
all the fates you like.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Not to be rude, bud, but I can tell you had
this whole deal planned out, and none of
it is sitting right with me. But sure, okay. You wanna play?
Let's play.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.speaker: Villager
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.text:
Oh, damn it all! I can't believe the
fiends caught up with me when
I was so close to the village!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.speaker: Villager
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.text:
Well, everyone in town is on the brink
of starvation, so I've no choice but to
protect this food with my very life.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.text:
You okay there, bud? How about you
go on ahead and let me handle this?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.speaker: Villager
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.text:
I don't know who you are,
but I owe you big time!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.speaker: Villager
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.text:
Oh, damn it all! I can't believe the
fiends caught up with me when
I was so close to the village!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.speaker: Villager
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.text:
I can't die now! I have to get
these medicinal plants back to
my sick little sister!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.text:
You okay there, bud? How about you
go on ahead and let me handle this?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.speaker: Villager
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.text:
Hey, you're the one who saved me the
other day! Thank you again! I owe you!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Policeman
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
Where the hell is the bomb disposal unit!?
This thing's about to blow, and we'll
never get the civvies out in time!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Policeman
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
About damn time, bomb guy! Get over here
and stop that detonator already!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
Well, that's a heck of a how-do-you-do.
Could I maybe get a few more details
on this bomb of yours, fella?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Policeman
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
The detonator has chips of three colors:
red, blue, and yellow. If you put 'em back
in their original order, it stops the timer.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
Don't suppose you happen to know
the original order, eh?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Policeman
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
I can't remember it clearly, but I don't
think any of the chips were in the same
position as they are now.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Policeman
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
Uh, I think the blue chip was somewhere
to the right of the red chip?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
Got three chips here: red, blue, and yellow.
If we put 'em back in their original order,
the bomb won't blow. The original order had all three chips in
different positions than they are now,
and the blue chip was somewhere right
of the red one. That about cover it?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_01.text: Heck yeah. I'm the dang man.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_01.speaker: Policeman
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_01.text:
Thank you so much. You have no idea
how many lives you saved today.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Everyone, please remain calm! There's a whole
herd of fiends out there, but we'll be safe
so long as we stay in this shelter.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Woman
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Excuse me, but has anyone seen my cat!?
I don't see Lady Purrs-A-Lot anywhere,
and I'm afraid she may have run outside!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
No, ma'am, I haven't seen your cat,
and I'm afraid I can't let you outside.
Now please just sit down and be calm.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Woman
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Nooo! Lady Purrs-A-Lot!
I have to go find her!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Ma'am, what are you doing!?
Do NOT go outside!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Probably want to listen to that fella,
ma'am. It sounds like there's a heck
of a lot of fiends out there.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Woman
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
My sweet little kitty might be outside!
I have to go find her!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text: Fine, but I'm coming with you.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text: Shouldn't we search in here first?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Woman
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text: Oh, what a nice young man!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text: No, you idiot! Don't open the door!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Woman
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text: Well, I suppose it's possible that she's still around here, but I've been searching for quite a while now...

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Gah! They've broken down the door!
We got fiends incoming, people!
Run for your lives!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_010.text:
Okay, that's all the dang fiends.
Now let's go find your cat, ma'am.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.text:
Well, I managed to fight 'em off.
Are you okay, ma'am?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.speaker: Woman
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.text:
Lady Purrs-A-Lot! There you are!
Oh, Mama has been so worried!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.speaker: Woman
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.text: You are a lifesaver, young man!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Explorer
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
It's been over 10 days since I entered this
sweltering jungle in search of the legendary
Great Beast. My provisions have run out,
and I've now become thoroughly lost. Yes, this may well be
the place I die...

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Explorer
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
The Great Beast! I've found it at last!
I must catch it immediately!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
Fella, you couldn't catch a cold in your
condition. Now run for your life before
that thing ends it for you!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Explorer
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
Heavens, there's someone else out here!?
Who are you, sir, and why have you... No, that doesn't matter. I have staked my
very life on capturing the Great Beast,
so I suggest you stay out of my way!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
Heck, that thing was one tough customer—
took everything I had to bring it down.
No way you were gonna take it out.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Explorer
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
You fool! You thrice-damned fool!
I came here to CAPTURE the beast,
and you've gone and SLAIN it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
Have some perspective, guy.
You should be grateful you're still
on the right side of the dirt here.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Explorer
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
My beast... Give me back
my precious beast!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
I feel quite certain the lost treasure of the
Empire is concealed deep within these tunnels,
but I've no idea which fork to take.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
You there! You look like quite
the intuitive fellow!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Uh, me?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Which fork would you choose?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Lemme see here...

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Left fork for sure.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: It's the middle one.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Eh, I'm feelin' right.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Then I shall defer to your
great wisdom. Tally-ho!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Golly, pal, I'm not sure
that's such a hot idea.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Another fork. Which way this time,
my fine adventuring friend!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Lemme see here...

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Left's callin' my name.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Got a good feeling about middle.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Right. Gotta be right.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Very well. We shall proceed thusly.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
This fella's got no idea
what he's doing, does he?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Holy moly! Treasure chests!
And three of 'em, too.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Eureka! This is, without a doubt,
the lost treasure of the Empire! But according to the literature,
only one chest holds what we seek,
while the others are but fiendish traps.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Hmm? What's this written on the wall?
'The untrodden path will guide you
to the treasure.'

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Hmm? What's this written on the wall?
'The untrodden paths hide traps.'

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Well, friend? Which do you believe
to be the real treasure?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Tossing it to me again?
Geez, talk about indecisive...

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
'The untrodden path will guide
you to the treasure,' eh...?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
'The untrodden paths hide
traps,' eh...?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: The treasure's on the left.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: The treasure's in the center.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: The treasure's on the right.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Huzzah! Nothing to
do now but open it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Criminy, look at all that loot!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
The lost treasure of the Empire
is mine at last!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Your judgment has served me well,
my fine fellow. Thank you so much!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Hey, no worries, guy.
I'm just glad you're safe.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Dang it! Empty. ...Oh, but there's
something written at the bottom.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
'The punishment for thieves is death.'
That doesn't sound good.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Huh? That an earthquake?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
It's a trap—the tunnels are collapsing!
Run for it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: There's no time! We're not gonna make it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: GAAAAAAHHH!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_00.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_00.text:
I'm involved in the preservation of the
wild bird population, and am currently
investigating how many have returned
to these woods due to our efforts.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_00.text:
Gosh, that's real admirable work there.
But hey, does your count include that
giant bird that's comin' right for us?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_00.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_00.text:
Sweet feathers, that's no bird!
It's a fiend!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_01.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_01.text:
With that fiend gone, even more wild birds
will now return to our magnificent forests.
You've done a great service to all of our
winged friends this day!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
I am indeed, for an accurate survey of the
bird population is a necessary component
of our environmental-protection efforts.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Wow, my guy. You are seriously
dedicated to this.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
966. ...No, wait. That was a fiend.
It doesn't count.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah, and the one before that was a fiend
as well, so let's exclude that.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah, and there are four
more birds over there.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text: Oh! I see six birds there!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
And that makes... Goodness, I've lost
track. Where is the count at now?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah, yes. Thank you. One must always
have an accurate count, after all!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, I think I've helped this fella
avoid any work-related mishaps.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Er, are you certain? Because I thought...
Aaargh! Talking to you has made me lose
track of the count completely!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Enough! Do not speak to me again.
Now farewell.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Hold up, fella! There's
a huge cliff right—

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah, geez. Didn't expect it
to end like that.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
It's finished! It's finally complete!
A blade with the perfect combination of
flexibility and strength, and a temper
pattern that simply ripples with life! As a swordsmith, this blade will
surely be my masterpiece!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: All that remains is to give it a name worthy of its majesty. I hereby dub thee...Darkblayde!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: You sure about that, guy?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Darkblayde... I like it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: You there! What is your problem?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
I'm just saying to give the name a little
more thought, maybe? I mean, people are 
gonna hear that and instantly form opinions.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Well, of course they will! That's the POINT! Oh, but fine. I'll try again. I hereby dub thee...Deathblayde!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: You sure about that, guy?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Deathblayde... I like it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: NOW what's your problem?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Kind of an ominous name, don't you think?
I mean, not to be rude, but I'd think I'd try
something a little less gloomy, maybe?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Oh? Hmm. Perhaps so. In that case, I hereby dub thee...Dreadblayde!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: You sure about that, guy?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Dreadblayde... I like it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
I don't think you really understand the
objection I have to the name here, fella.
Maybe go with Sunbeam or Twinklegrin or—

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Shut up, shut up, SHUT UUUUUUP!
I don't even care anymore!
I'm done thinking of names!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: C'mon, guy. Don't be like that.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
This was supposed to be my masterpiece,
and now I can't even stand to look at it!
Get out of my sight, damn you!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Cripes, fella, I'm real sorry.
Didn't mean for you to give up
the swordmaking game forever here...

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Then you will be forevermore known as Darkblayde Hideyoshi!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Gosh, that name's sorta... I dunno. Evil?
Aren't you worried it'll get infused
with a bunch foul energies, maybe?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Then you will be forevermore known as Deathblayde Ieyasu!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Gosh, that name's sorta... I dunno. Evil?
Aren't you worried it'll get infused
with a bunch foul energies, maybe?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Then you will be forevermore known as Dreadblayde Nobunaga!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Gosh, that name's sorta... I dunno. Evil?
Aren't you worried it'll get infused
with a bunch foul energies, maybe?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
I am suddenly overcome with an urge
to put this sword's edge to the test...
And your ripe flesh will do nicely!
Bwa ha! Bwaaa ha ha ha!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Yep. The thing's evil, all right.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: What... What have I done!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: How about I hold onto that sword for you, eh, fella? Then next time, you can create your true masterpiece.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
...The heck? Am I inside some critter?
Oh hey, somebody's there.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Waaaaaah! Waaaaaah!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
What's the deal there, fella?
How did you end up in here?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
I fell into the sea and was swallowed
by a giant fish and I wanna get out
of here... Waaah!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
So we're inside a fish? Cripes, this
is something else. Also, how are we
gonna get out of here?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Let's burn stuff to make smoke.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Let's start bashing stuff.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Let's wait it out.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
There's a pile of trash over there that the
fish must've swallowed. Let's set it on fire
and fill this place with smoke, eh?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
And when the fish coughs out the smoke,
we take the opportunity to get away!
Gee, mister! You sure are smart!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
And look! Got some matches right here.
Lemme just get this thing going...

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Yep, that went up real nice;
we're getting lots of good smoke.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Oh no, mister! Look over there!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh man, is that a powder keg?
If that thing catches, we're in trouble.
Abort plan, bud! Douse the flame!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: I can't, mister! It's too big!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: IT'S GONNA BLOW!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: We gotta make this fella want to spit us out, so let's start bashing the heck out of it and see if we can irritate his stomach lining.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Gee, mister! You sure are smart!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Let's get to work, bud.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Is it working, mister?
Did the fish open its mouth?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Nope. Seems this guy here
is one tough customer.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh no, mister! There are fiends
coming at us from further down!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Hoo boy. Fish must've swallowed
those fellas too.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Panicking won't accomplish anything, bud. 
We should conserve our strength and just
sleep on it for now.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
You want to SLEEP, mister? Now?
Gee, I dunno...

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Look, at some point while we're sleeping,
this overgrown tuna is gonna open his mouth.
We just need to be patient, yeah?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Well, if you say so.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Boy howdy, that was a good snooze.
C'mon, bud, let's see if this fish
opened up yet.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Rise and shine, lazybones!
...The heck? He's not moving.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: What!? No! He melted! His whole body melted! Stomach acid must've gotten the poor fella while we were sleeping.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Hmm... Come to think of it,
I'm feeling a touch itchy myself...

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: OH NO! I'M MEEELTIIING!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_01.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_01.text:
Look at that! The fish
opened its mouth!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_01.text:
All that ruckus must've done
the trick. Let's go!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
Perfection! Now that our new security
mech is ready, the city will be safe.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
You there! Sir! I'm sorry, but could you help
me activate this mech? I don't happen to
have a free hand at the moment.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Sure thing, ma'am. Whatcha need?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Do you see a lever and switch?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: These ones here, yeah?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
First, pull the lever down.
Next, press the switch three times.
Finally, raise the lever again.
This will activate the mech.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
First, press the switch two times.
Next, lower the lever and press the switch once.
Finally, raise the lever again.
This will activate the mech.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
Lever, switch three times, lever.
You got it.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
Switch twice, lever, switch once, lever.
You got it.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
Incidentally, as a safety precaution,
any error in the start-up sequence
will cause the unit to self-destruct.
So do be careful, yes?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
Cripes, lady. Why the heck would
you design it that way?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
When you have three doctorates, you can
design whatever mech you like. Now begin.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Okay, let's see...

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Next...

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Use the lever.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Press the switch.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Success! It's starting up!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
Holy moly, that was nerve-racking.
Can't swear I understand everything
I did just there, but at least I
prevented a disaster for the lady.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
Egads, you feckless oaf!
You've just activated the
self-destruct mechanism!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
Well, shucks. This ain't good.
My bad!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: WE'RE ALL GOING TO DIIIE!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: GYAAAAAAH!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.speaker: Showgirl
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.text:
Attention, everyone! If you visit our
department store today, you'll get
a chance to meet our popular new
mascot, Spendy McBigbucks!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.speaker: Showgirl
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.text:
Come on! Let's give our customers
a warm welcome, Spendy!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.text:
Cripin' heck! That's not a mascot—
it's a dang fiend!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.text:
Can't believe you folks let
an actual fiend in here.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.text:
Heck, lady, don't pay me no mind.
I'm just one of those mysterious
phenomena that's passin' through.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: Oh my gosh, you're late! Don't tell me you forgot that Capitol Cuisine! is airing live today!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: That some kind of cooking show?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
We don't have time for this, chef!
Just get in the studio!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: Ah, there's nothing better than creating your own meals from scratch. Welcome, friends, to a special live edition of...Capitol Cuisine!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
We'll begin with the dough.
What are the ingredients, chef?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
We'll begin with a caramel sauce.
What are the ingredients, chef?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
Next, we add the toppings.
What are the ingredients, chef?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
Next, we make the custard.
What are the ingredients, chef?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: And now we pop it in the oven.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: Oooh, I can't wait to try it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh my, that cooked up nicely!
Let's try a little, shall we?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: Ugh! Oh god, I'm gonna hurl!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: Kill the feed! KILL THE FEEEEEED!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: We'll see you all next week on Capitol Cuisine!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Boy
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text:
Are there really ghosts
in this abandoned house?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Girl
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text: Yeah! My brother totally saw one!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text:
You two need to make like a rug on a line
and beat it. This is no place for kids.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text: The heck? I'm not a ghost.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Boy
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text: Hey, don't scare us like that!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text: You two got fuzz in your ears? I'm not a ghost.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text:
Everything's okay now, kids.
I took care of the fiend.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Girl
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text:
See? I told you there
were ghosts here!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Boy
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text: I'm sorry. I believe you now.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text: Get on outta here, ya scamps.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: Don't shoot! I'm the real one!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_B
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: Don't listen to her! I'm the real one!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, gosh. These two gals
twins or something?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
No! I was chasin' down a dangerous alien,
but when I took my eye off it for a second,
it shapeshifted into a goddamn civilian!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Now I can't tell 'em apart!
Which one do I shoot?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: Don't shoot either one, guy.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: Eh, just shoot 'em both.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Damn it! I was so close to
gettin' the dirtbag—AND
to my retirement!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
How dare you point your gun
at a civilian!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_B
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
I'm filing an official complaint!
I'll have your badge!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: Oof. Tough break there, guy.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: The hell did you say!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
No sense trying to figure out which
one's real—just shoot 'em both so
you know the job's done right.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: Are you out of your goddamn mind!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Hey, if you don't have the guts
I'm happy to take care of it.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: No, stop! I'm human, I swear!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_B
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Is this some kind of joke!?
You can't be serious!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: I'm serious as a heart attack, bud.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_B
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
This guy is out of his mind...
Well, there's no way I'm
going down without a fight!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Looks like somebody played
right into my trap!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Phew! I'm real glad that worked,
because, uh...I wasn't actually
sure it would.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Buddy, you had me on the edge
of my seat there. Were you really
gonna shoot 'em both?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
What? No! That would be nuts.
Really am glad that worked out, though...

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Girl
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
Maru's my kitty! But I accidently left
a window open and he ran away.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
That's a bummer, all right—but
what about that cat over there?
Is that Maru, maybe?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
Now hold on just a second, kiddo.
That cat there looks real scared;
I'm guessing being out in the big,
bad world has him in a panic.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Girl
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
Oh no, he ran away!
You're a LIAR, mister!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
Nice and slow now, kiddo...
Niiice and slow...

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
Okay, we're good and close here,
but Maru still seems pretty spooked.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Girl
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
Oh no, he ran away!
You're a LIAR, mister!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
See that? He seems a lot
more relaxed now, eh?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text: You should be able to pick him up.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Assassin
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
Red Panther here: I've arrived at the
heart. Moving to eliminate the target.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Assassin
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
Sorry, pal. It's just business.
Nothing personal.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
Hey guy, what are you doing?
That's a heart! Shoot that,
and someone's gonna die!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Assassin
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
My briefing didn't say anything about another
agent. Unless... Aw, hell! Don't tell me the
president's people caught wind of our plans!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
Guy, I got no idea what
you're talking about.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Assassin
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
Doesn't matter! Get out of the way
unless you wanna be put on ice!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
Got no idea what that was all about,
but I think I just saved the life
of whoever's body this is.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MERCHANT_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MERCHANT_000_CU.text: Lordy, this one sure is abrupt.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MERCHANT_000_CU.speaker: Trader
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MERCHANT_000_CU.text:
Thank you. When I stumbled across those
fiends, I thought I was a dead man.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MERCHANT_000_CU.speaker: Trader
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MERCHANT_000_CU.text:
As a merchant, allow me to repay your
kindness with a reward of your choice.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Sorry, bud. Nothing out here
but sand and lots of it.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.text:
That's some tough luck right there.
Wish I could help.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Lucky you—I just got some water
from a merchant fella. Drink up.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.text:
Impede me not, vile fiends! I must deliver 
this message from the king forthwith,
and my duty shall not be denied!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.text:
I'll handle these folks, guy.
You go deliver that message.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.text:
My heartiest thanks, blessed ser!
I am ever in your debt!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.text:
Sure hope that knight fella
made it where he was going.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MESSENGER2_000_.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MESSENGER2_000_.text:
Fie! To think I might be ensnared by more
fell fiends with the castle near in sight! 
But the peril is no matter; this warning
must reach the king at any cost!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MESSENGER2_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MESSENGER2_000_.text:
I'll handle these folks, guy.
You go deliver that message.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MESSENGER2_000_.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_MESSENGER2_000_.text:
Again!? My debt to you deepens
all the more, brave ser!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.text: Are we in a forest here?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.speaker: Witch
Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.text:
Didn't realize I took orders
from you, lady.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.speaker: Witch
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.text:
So that's how it is, hm?
Then you leave me no choice.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.text: Gah! She sicced fiends on me!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.speaker: Witch
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, don't be so cross! Look, I'll even
give you a potion to compensate.
Which would you like, mmm?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Daughter
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text:
I was bitten by this horrid snake earlier!
I didn't think it was serious, but the
thing turned out to be venomous,
and now I'm going to DIE!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text:
Yep, you look pretty pale there...
Whoa, and that fever's no joke!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Daughter
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text:
Nooo! I'm too pretty to die!
You have to run and get a doctor!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text:
Lady, I barely even know where I am;
got no idea where to find a doctor.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text:
I told you, I don't know where
to find a dang doctor around...

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text:
Hey, wait. What about the antidote
I got from the scary old lady?
Here. Try this.

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text:
Boy howdy, this is a heck of a storm.
Am I on the deck of a ship?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sailor_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text:
Ho there, landlubber!
Lend a hand!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sailor_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text:
The ship took a real hit from the storm,
and we've lost both a sailor and a
treasure chest overboard!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sailor_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text:
If we don't pull 'em both up fast,
they'll be at the bottom of the sea!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text:
Okay, we pulled up the chest.
Now, on to...

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sailor_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text: Damn the waves! We're too late!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sailor_B
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text: Thank you... You saved my life...

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text:
Now let's get that chest up here and...
Huh? Where'd it go?

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sailor_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text: Damn the waves! It took the treasure!

SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, we did save your pal there.
What say we just call that a win?
